title: Have I bought, sold or traded with you this year?
author: GehrigFan

posts.post_title: Have I bought, sold or traded with you this year?
posts.post_content:
My OCD side takes a little too much control sometimes and makes me clean out my PM inbox daily. Unfortunately, that means I never really created a list of people I have traded with. I've probably worked with over 200 of you since January. If you recall buying, selling or trading with me, please do me a favor and drop me a PM so I can add your username to my list. 

Thank you!
Mark
